item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night:

This Saturday night we celebrate Valentines for SINGLES & COUPLES. We'll start off with SPEED DATING for women ages 30 +, Karaoke (Lounge) and D.J. (Blue Room)

Find that someone for cuddling or frolicking in the snow! Meeting hotties doesn't get any easier than this. You get 4 minutes with a bunch of different singles, we provide conversation topics to get you started and a painless way at the end of the evening to tell the cuties you liked that, well, that you like 'em.

First come, first serve. Seats fill up fast, so get in line before 7:00 pm.

We'll also have KARAOKE in the Lounge along with a complimentary buffet.


Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

Great DJ that will be mixing their R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

Any questions e-mail: BlushBoston@yahoo.com

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Premium Liquor
• (Food)
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $10.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: The Hide Away
